title: Scholarium
text:
As a universal scholar of immense influence Leonard Euler creates an steady source of inspiration. JSTOR records more than 40 000 publication in its collection.
Euler collection of JSTOR


Scholarly article can be cited from bibliographical databases. Bibliographical reference databases can be imported into the markdown document directly from a bibtex file. It is either locally stored or imported from the web. Opera-Bernoulli-Euler maintains its open access bibliographies published on Zenodo which can be computationally imported for this purpose.(Eckert 2002)

Eckert, Michael. 2002. “Euler and the Fountains of Sanssouci.” Archive for History of Exact Sciences 56 (6): 451–68. http://www.jstor.org/stable/41134151.
Online article

title: lettre-digital-tutorial
text:
Bibliographical references can be imported into the markdown document from a bibtex file. It is either locally stored or imported from the web. Opera-Bernoulli-Euler maintains its open access bibliographies published on Zenodo which can be computationally imported for this purpose.(Askey 1980)



Askey, Richard. 1980. “Ramanujan’s Extensions of the Gamma and Beta Functions.” The American Mathematical Monthly: The Official Journal of the Mathematical Association of America 87 (5): 346–59. https://doi.org/10.2307/2321202.

title: lettre-digital-tutorial
text: This is a notebook for the Quarto project. Quarto is a new document format that allows you to write documents in markdown and have them rendered to a variety of formats including HTML, PDF, Word, and more. Quarto is built on top of Pandoc and is designed to be a superset of Pandoc markdown. Quarto is also designed to be a superset of R Markdown, so you can use all of the features of R Markdown in Quarto documents.

title: lettre-digital-tutorial
text:
Editions like Euler Opera Omnia and Bernoulli Opera Omnia are a great source of information and scholarly reference. They are also a great source of scholarly inquiry. New findings can be published with traditional publication channels like book or articles. Novel media are Euler Opera Omnia Serie Quinta: Contributions. There core format are

quarto notebooks in markdown format
computational notebooks in Jupyter format
observablehq notebooks

The notebooks are published in the Euler Opera Omnia Serie Quinta: Contributions after a fast peer review process. The notebooks are published under a CC-BY-SA license. The notebooks are published in the Euler Opera Omnia Serie Quinta: Contributions after a fast peer review process. The notebooks are published under a CC-BY-SA license.
